name: My Pet World
overview: make your favorite animals better again! The animals, your best friends, are sick and they need your care. With the help of enthusiastic veterinarians, you can solve real medical files. After your diagnosis, you give the animals the right treatment. Then you nurse the animals until they are strong enough to go home again. The fate of your favorite animals is in your hands. In brief: * More than 20 different animal species to take care of. * Diagnose, treat and monitor the animals as they recover. * 30 challenging medical records written by real vets. * You become a better vet and get more and more tools at your disposal. * Fully Dutch speaking
